md:
giải nghĩa từ "wagon" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Wagon (noun) - Xe ngựa, xe chở hàng
	+ Meaning: A wagon is a vehicle with four wheels, used for carrying goods or people.
	+ Example: The farmer used a wagon to transport his crops to the market.
	+ Related words: cart, carriage, truck, vehicle
	+ Antonyms: pedestrian, walker

* Wagon (verb) - Đưa xe ngựa, chở hàng
	+ Meaning: To wagon something means to transport it using a wagon.
	+ Example: They wagoned the furniture to the new house.
	+ Related words: carry, transport, haul, convey
	+ Antonyms: walk, carry on foot
html:

  • Wagon (noun) - Xe ngựa, xe chở hàng

    • Meaning: A wagon is a vehicle with four wheels, used for carrying goods or people.
    • Example: The farmer used a wagon to transport his crops to the market.
    • Related words: cart, carriage, truck, vehicle
    • Antonyms: pedestrian, walker

  • Wagon (verb) - Đưa xe ngựa, chở hàng

    • Meaning: To wagon something means to transport it using a wagon.
    • Example: They wagoned the furniture to the new house.
    • Related words: carry, transport, haul, convey
    • Antonyms: walk, carry on foot
